message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $8,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $8,500, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
